definitions.text: a number that identifies a position relative to an axis

examples: Can you help me organize my files?

definitions.text: bring into common action, movement, or condition
examples: coordinate the painters, masons, and plumbers
coordinate his actions with that of his colleagues

definitions.text: bring (components or parts) into proper or desirable coordination correlation
examples: align the wheels of my car

definitions.text: of equal importance, rank, or degree
